tic_tac_toe.title: Your Turn: Vocabulary
tic_tac_toe.directions: Match each word to the sentence it completes. If you are correct, place your X on the board by clicking a square. Three spaces in a row wins.

item.text: The meeting was attended by all my [colleagues].
The character in the story performed a [valiant] deed.
The sound of a motor [drones] on nearly every night.
The man was dressed [conservatively] for his interview.
This speed is hard to [sustain] for too long.
The discovery of a new [galaxy] was announced by the astronomer.
[ultimately], it’s your decision!
When I’m busy, I’m [oblivious] to noise around me.
Her [fatigue] was natural after a long dance practice.
The fifth grade [promotion] ceremony was exciting!
I love to watch my grandfather [carve] the turkey.
We stood on a [boundary] that divides four states.
As a [consequence] of heavy snow, school was closed.
My mother claims that my [appetite] for vegetables has improved.
I hope that I [inherit] my mother’s talent for acting.
The boy tried to [persuade] his brother to join the game.
I felt [dejected] because we lost the baseball game.
Food that is not stored correctly will [decay].
The [loyal] dog waited patiently for her owner.
We lit a [lantern] when the power failed.
The [gnarled] tree is older than my grandfather.
All the silly [nonsense] made us laugh out loud.
In the [future], I won’t forget my sweater.
The library was so [noisy] that it was hard to focus.
